english: Good morning, everyone.
Thank you for joining the meeting.
Could you please introduce yourself?
I would like to welcome you to our company.
Let’s start the meeting.
Please take a seat.
Today’s agenda is as follows.
Can you share the presentation?
I have a question regarding the proposal.
turkish: Teklif ile ilgili bir sorum var.

english: Could you elaborate on that point?
turkish: O konu hakkında biraz daha detaylı bilgi verebilir misiniz?

english: We need to discuss the budget allocation.
The deadline for the project is next Friday.
I will send you the meeting minutes later.
Please confirm your availability for a meeting.
turkish: Bir toplantı için müsait olduğunuzu teyit eder misiniz?

english: We should schedule a follow-up meeting.
Let me know if you have any questions.
turkish: Herhangi bir sorunuz varsa bana bildirin.

english: We need to finalize the contract.
I am looking forward to our collaboration.
Could you send me the updated report?
I will review the documents and get back to you.
turkish: Belgeleri inceleyeceğim ve size dönüş yapacağım.

english: Our company values transparency and integrity.
turkish: Şirketimiz şeffaflık ve bütünlüğe değer verir.

english: Please find the attached file.
We need to improve our customer service.
Let’s discuss the project timeline.
I have scheduled a conference call for tomorrow.
turkish: Yarın için bir telefon konferansı planladım.

english: Could you please confirm your attendance?
We appreciate your prompt response.
I will forward your email to the relevant department.
Let’s review the quarterly performance.
Please update me on the current status.
Our team is working on the new strategy.
I would like to propose a new idea.
Could you clarify that for me?
I agree with your suggestion.
We need to consider alternative solutions.
Our main objective is to increase sales.
The market trends are showing positive growth.
turkish: Pazar eğilimleri olumlu bir büyüme gösteriyor.

english: We have a strong team in place.
Could you please explain the process?
I am responsible for managing the project.
Let’s set some clear objectives.
We must adhere to the deadline.
Please prepare a detailed report.
I will follow up on the pending tasks.
Our meeting is scheduled for 10 AM.
I need some additional information.
Could you please provide further details?
Let’s arrange a meeting to discuss this further.
turkish: Bunu daha detaylı tartışmak için bir toplantı ayarlayalım.

english: I appreciate your cooperation.
We need to resolve this issue immediately.
Please let me know your thoughts on this matter.
turkish: Bu konu hakkındaki düşüncelerinizi bildirir misiniz?

english: Our budget has been approved.
I will coordinate with the marketing department.
Let’s work together to achieve our goals.
We need to streamline our processes.
I will send a follow-up email after the meeting.
Could you update the project file?
We are facing some challenges.
Let’s discuss possible solutions.
I will arrange a meeting with the team.
We need to analyze the market data.
Our sales have increased this quarter.
I am confident in our strategy.
Let’s focus on customer satisfaction.
I have attached the contract for your review.
We need to sign the agreement by the end of the week.
turkish: Hafta sonuna kadar anlaşmayı imzalamamız gerekiyor.

english: Please confirm receipt of this email.
turkish: Bu e-postayı aldığınızı teyit eder misiniz?

english: I am available for a call at your convenience.
turkish: Size uygun bir zamanda görüşmeye hazırım.

english: Let’s discuss this over a conference call.
I would like to set up a meeting next week.
turkish: Gelecek hafta bir toplantı ayarlamak istiyorum.

english: Could you please send the proposal by tomorrow?
We need to review our quarterly targets.
turkish: Üç aylık hedeflerimizi gözden geçirmemiz gerekiyor.

english: The project is on track.
I will update you on any progress.
turkish: Herhangi bir gelişme olursa sizi bilgilendireceğim.

english: Our team has been working diligently.
Please allocate the necessary resources.
We need to reduce operational costs.
I have scheduled a meeting with our suppliers.
Could you please confirm the delivery date?
We are open to negotiation.
I look forward to a successful partnership.
turkish: Başarılı bir iş ortaklığını dört gözle bekliyorum.

english: Please review the attached documents.
We need to update our business plan.
I will coordinate with the finance team.
Our meeting will be held in the main conference room.
Could you please summarize the key points?
We need to set realistic targets.
I appreciate your timely feedback.
turkish: Zamanında geri bildiriminiz için teşekkür ederim.

english: Let’s prepare a comprehensive report.
I am responsible for client relations.
We need to maintain high quality standards.
I will send you the revised document.
Could you clarify the project requirements?
I am available for a meeting this afternoon.
Let’s touch base later this week.
We need to address the client’s concerns.
I will draft an email and send it for review.
turkish: Bir e-posta taslağı hazırlayıp incelemeniz için göndereceğim.

english: Our strategy has been very effective so far.
turkish: Stratejimiz şimdiye kadar çok etkili oldu.

english: Could you please provide an update on the project?
Thank you for your cooperation and hard work.
turkish: İşbirliğiniz ve sıkı çalışmanız için teşekkür ederim.
